channel.title: GuySuCo on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in GuySuCo on The Guyana Brief

item.title: ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡¾ Saturday Brief: Opposition Leader Rips Budget, Secret Extradition Revealed, and Linden Gets a Stadium
item.description: Opposition Leader Mohamed delivers maiden budget speech and it’s a SCORCHER, a secret US extradition request surfaces, Linden opens its shiny new stadium, Ali promises miners the moon (if they declare their gold), and the Windies take on Scotland in the T20 World Cup opener.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh's Take â€” 'Dem Got a Plan fuh Everything and All Dem Could Do is Complain!'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle and can’t believe the opposition still complaining while the government delivering 53,000 house lots, 9 million carbon credits, and a five-year sugar plan. Plus: Panama opening an embassy, Lady Jags scoring 14 goals, and Minister Browne put Dawn Hastings in she place.
